tagline: Code to simulate two counterpropagating fields in a nonlinear optical medium
body:
### Two-beam Nonlinear Optics
This code is designed to simulate nonlinear coupling between two counterpropagating beams. These systems are known to exhibit pattern formation, polarization instabilities, and intensity instabilities.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Two-beam-nlo
